title: Sonoma
name: Sunflower Caff√©
content: Serving breakfast, lunch, and happy hour, Sunflower is popular with locals. It's been featured on "Diners, Drive-In's and Dives," but it doesn't fit into any of those categories. Casual dining inside, but the highlight is the back patio. Delicious brunch, salads and sandwiches. Happy hour is served from 3-4PM with locals wines and beers. Free wifi.
